entity_types.name: AI Tool
entity_types.description: Software, models, or platforms that leverage artificial intelligence to perform tasks, analyze data, or assist in various research processes. This type is central to understanding how researchers are integrating AI into their methods.
common_contexts: concerns about quality and intellectual property

entity_types.name: Research Method
entity_types.description: Systematic approaches or techniques used to conduct research, collect data, and analyze findings. Understanding the specific methods is crucial for analyzing how AI is being integrated and adapted.

entity_types.name: Researcher
entity_types.description: Individuals involved in conducting, managing, consuming, or supporting research activities. This type represents the 'who' in the analytic question, focusing on their experiences and adaptations to AI.
common_contexts: adopting and experimenting with AI tools
seeking training and education on AI

entity_types.name: Research Process
entity_types.description: Distinct stages, activities, or workflows involved in planning, executing, and disseminating research. AI's impact on these processes, particularly in terms of efficiency and challenges, is a key aspect of adaptation.
common_contexts: areas where AI automation could be helpful
impacted by AI for efficiency or risk

entity_types.name: Research Data
entity_types.description: Information, observations, or facts collected, generated, or used in research, which can be qualitative or quantitative. AI often processes, analyzes, or extracts insights from this data, making it crucial for understanding AI integration.
common_contexts: processed by AI tools for extraction or summarization
concerns about sensitive or classified information
challenges with missing or large datasets

entity_types.name: Research Output
entity_types.description: Tangible products or deliverables resulting from research activities, often intended for dissemination. AI can assist in the creation, refinement, or summarization of these outputs, influencing research dissemination.
common_contexts: assisted by AI for writing or summarization
subject to editing and proofreading processes

entity_types.name: Organization
entity_types.description: Institutions, departments, or groups that conduct, fund, or regulate research. The organizational context shapes the adoption and experience of AI tools in research.

relationship_types.name: Uses
relationship_types.description: An entity employs or applies another entity for a specific purpose in research.

example_relationships.context: heard lots of researchers that are using the subscription based ai products
you can use the ai tools to check the code
A lot of people integrate a TTX into their research design.

relationship_types.name: Assists In
relationship_types.description: An AI tool provides support or aid in performing a research process or creating a research output.

example_relationships.context: We can use AI for a literature review
Summaries I found AI super helpful
just having AI transcribed the meeting minutes put it in like here are the key decisions.

relationship_types.name: Impacts
relationship_types.description: One entity has a significant effect or influence on another, which can be positive or negative.

example_relationships.context: I worry about career development and skillset development among the younger folks.
there is a risk to our research being utilized opportunistically by AI company
If you knew you could get this out in time to achieve A policy impact quickly. It could impact you know how you even conduct a study

relationship_types.name: Performs
relationship_types.description: A researcher carries out a specific research process or applies a research method.

example_relationships.context: Probably my most common methodology is, is qualitative interviewing
I also do a fair amount of cost benefit analysis
I’ve been writing proposals non-stop.

relationship_types.name: Generates
relationship_types.description: One entity creates or produces another entity, such as data or research outputs.

example_relationships.context: some projects have a scenario team and they develop scenarios
I’ve played a little with telling it to, to make an image for proposal.
AI to create these citations for you

relationship_types.name: Concerns About
relationship_types.description: A researcher expresses apprehension or worry regarding an AI tool or a research process, often related to ethical, quality, or competitive risks.

example_relationships.context: Other thing I’d say is worried about implementing AI very much in Arroyo
One of the things researchers are increasingly concerned about is data mining
I don’t want to inadvertently take someone else’s intellectual property.

relationship_types.name: Requires
relationship_types.description: One entity necessitates or depends on another for its execution, completion, or proper functioning.

example_relationships.context: we have to get very kinds of permissions to collect the data.
We're doing a data collection now... and we're having to go through review by OMB
depends on the data bc what do you have available to do an evaluation
